p: EOs that originate from different plants display antinociceptive and anti-inflammatory properties. Bergamot ( Citrus bergamia) is a fruit best known for its EO used in aromatherapy to minimize symptoms of stress-induced anxiety and mild mood disorders and cancer pain [ 29]. The antinociceptive effect of EOs of Salvia sclarea (clary sage), Thymus vulgaris (thyme), and Lavandula angustifolia (true lavender), were examined in the capsaicin test [ 29, 47]. The capsaicin test in mice is a reliable model of peripheral nociception, which produces nociceptive behavior similar to that elicited by the intraplantar injection of formalin. Among these EOs, the intraplantar injection of bergamot EO produced a significant antinociceptive effect in mice [ 29, 47].
